results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates glomerulosclerosis in Adriamycin-induced-nephropathy rats
results.text_hl: Male Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into control, @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@ADR@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009401 @@@nephrosis@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@ADR@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009401 @@@nephrosis@@@ groups.

citations.NLM: Zhang W, Li Q, Wang L, Yang X. Simvastatin ameliorates glomerulosclerosis in Adriamycin-induced-nephropathy rats Pediatr Nephrol. 2008 Dec;23(12):2185-94. PMID: 18791746
citations.BibTeX: @article{18791746, title={Simvastatin ameliorates glomerulosclerosis in Adriamycin-induced-nephropathy rats}, author={Zhang W and Li Q and Wang L and Yang X}, journal={Pediatr Nephrol}, volume={23}, number={12}, pages={2185-94}}

results.title: Effects of Shenkangling intervention on the MAPK pathway in rats with doxorubicin-induced nephropathy.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to investigate the effects of Shenkangling intervention on the mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK) pathway in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Adriamycin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@ (@DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@AN@@@) and its underlying mechanism of action. @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009401 @@@Nephrosis@@@ was induced in healthy Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ and the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were untreated or treated with @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, Shenkangling, or a combination thereof.

citations.NLM: Ai S, Lin YY, Zheng J, Qiu CX, Liu YJ, Lin X. Effects of Shenkangling intervention on the MAPK pathway in rats with doxorubicin-induced nephropathy. Genet Mol Res. 2016 Aug 19;15(3):. PMID: 27706571
citations.BibTeX: @article{27706571, title={Effects of Shenkangling intervention on the MAPK pathway in rats with doxorubicin-induced nephropathy.}, author={Ai S and Lin YY and Zheng J and Qiu CX and Liu YJ and Lin X}, journal={Genet Mol Res}, volume={15}, number={3}}
